org.upmc.electisim

Class AStatefulAgentStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.upmc.electisim.AStatefulAgentStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAgentStrategy

    public abstract class AStatefulAgentStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAgentStrategy
    A strategy class used to restrict the knowledge to a stateful knowledge of the situation. The knowledge dispenser used will be StatefulKnowledgeDispenser and will provide the full state buffer.

        Specified by:
        executeVote in interface IAgentStrategy

      • executeVote

        public abstract AgentVote executeVote(Agent agent,
                                      IStatefulKnowledgeDispenser dispenser,
                                      java.util.List<IElectable> candidateList,
                                      int committeeSize)
        Executes the vote of the agent. Designed to be overridden and aims to restrict the knowledge dispenser to a stateful knowledge dispenser
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent executing the vote
        dispenser - The knowledge dispenser
        candidateList - The list of candidates in the current vote
        committeeSize - The size of the committee to vote for
        Returns:
        The result of the vote
